comments.raw_text: The Fenix and Chrome live site tests ran today, but most of them failed because of a whitelist that prevents tests from running with live sites on mozilla-central unless they are in this list.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.text: The Fenix and Chrome live site tests ran today, but most of them failed because of a whitelist that prevents tests from running with live sites on mozilla-central unless they are in this list.

comments.raw_text: This patch adds the new live site tests to the whitelist so that they can run.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9143100
Bug 1632865 - Add Raptor live site tests to whitelist and immediately disable playback. r?#perftest


This patch adds the new live site tests to the whitelist so that they can run.
comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.creator: pulsebot@bots.tld
